Item.name: Rattlegun
Item.description: A clunky, slow-firing two-handed submachine gun made from improvised parts. Due to its odd ammo 'shelf' as opposed to a proper magwell, it can only utilze compact .45 magazines, and it's shoddy construction can't handle the pressure of +P+ ammunition either.

Item.name: Flintlock
Item.description: An incredibly archaic weapon, essentially a short barrel with a hammer and a trigger designed to spark stored volatile powder, be it magnesium, phospherous or flash powder, in order to project loaded shot. It may be a bit dangerous to use from time to time, however...

Item.name: Handbomb
Item.description: A small, yet heavy iron round bomb with an explosive powder charge. Rather cheap and easy to make, but it won't go off underwater due to its fuse.

Item.name: Clustershot
Item.description: A bunch of loose, round metal pellets designed to be fired from a blunderbuss.

Item.name: Slugshot
Item.description: A large, round ball of metal designed to be fired from a powder-primed firearm.

Item.name: Blunderbuss
Item.description: An incredibly archaic weapon, essentially a barrel with a hammer and a trigger designed to spark stored volatile powder, be it magnesium, phospherous or flash powder, in order to project a cluster of loaded shot. It may be a bit dangerous to use from time to time, however...

Item.name: Assault Shotgun
Item.description: A deadly semi-automatic shotgun, with an extended tube for holding extra rounds. Compared to pump action designs, it's a bit more unweildy, but can fire a lot faster especially with practice.

Item.name: Obrez
Item.description: An extremely compact sawn-down rifle. Very innacurate and highly unweildy, but powerful in close quarters.

Item.name: Sawedoff
Item.description: An extremely compact sawn-down rifle. Very innacurate and highly unweildy, but powerful in close quarters.

Item.name: Multical Derringer
Item.description: An incredibly unweildy cheap single-shot pistol, with a wide bore capable of chambering and firing almost anything - though neither great accuracy nor strength. Widely available, and particularly popular among rebelious sorts, who have to improvise their ammo supply.

Item.name: Autopistol
Item.description: A compact civilian .45 caliber pistol. Easy to handle thanks to its light weight packing a decent punch against light targets. Only fits compact .45 magazines, and includes a rail for mounting and underbarrel flashlight.

Item.name: Bullpup Autopistol
Item.description: A highly unorthodox, bullpup semi-automatic pistol feeding powerful 6.8mm rifle rounds, designed to defeat light body armor.

Item.name: Vintage Autopistol
Item.description: An archaic style of .45 caliber pistol. Packs a mean punch with its solid steel frame and is capable of using extended magazines, but it's heavier and more difficult to handle.

Item.name: Vintage Machinepistol
Item.description: An archaic style of .45 caliber machine pistol. Packs a mean punch with its solid steel frame and is capable of using extended magazines, but it's heavier and more difficult to handle.

Item.name: Compact .45 Magazine
Item.description: A limited-capacity .45 magazine, most often traded to avoid Coalition regulations on civilian firearms.

Item.name: Medusa Revolver
Item.description: A heavy, large revolver. Can chamber either shotgun or .38 revolver rounds, though a little power is lost due to poor chamber fitting.

Item.name: Bulldog Revolver
Item.description: A heavy, yet compact revolver with a overtly large cylinder. Unlike a standard revolver, it can fire either rifle or handcannon shells due to their similar diameter, but it's slow to load and unweildy to fire, as well as loses some power due to its stubby barrel and poor chamber fitting.

Item.name: Rifle Carbine
Item.description: A short-barreled semi-automatic .30 caliber rifle. Unweidly in the hands of a novice, lethal in the hands of a professional.

Item.name: Rotary Grenade Launcher
Item.description: A heavy, six-chambered rotary 40mm grenade launcher. Capable of delivering an unholy amount of firepower in short notice.

Item.name: Rail Rifle
Item.description: An incredibly powerful, high-energy man-portable railgun, firing full-sized rail gun shells with tremendous force. Use with great caution!

Item.name: Sportsman Rifle
Item.description: A powerful, semi-automatic rifle feeding 6.8mm rounds through standard assault rifle magazines, though in what the coalition considers to be an acceptably 'civilian' legal platform.

Item.name: Vintage SMG
Item.description: A vintage style of .45 submachine gun. It's near solid-steel construction makes it quite heavy to lug around, but it's weight paired with its simple design and relatively low rate of fire make it easier to control for more amateur shooters. It may be outdated, but it still packs a nasty punch.

Item.name: Hammerhead Rifle
Item.description: A big ol over-under combination of a shotgun and rifle. Capable of firing both handcannon and shotgun rounds, from it's two seperately bored barrels- it packs a hell of a punch, but is finnicky to load quickly as a result.

Item.name: Assault Carbine
Item.description: An immensely powerful, short-barreled assault rifle lacking a stock. As a result, it is notably less accurate than its larger brethren, but it can be much more comfortable stashed away in one's belongings, and though it loses a little power due to the short barrel, it can still pack a nasty punch. Furthermore, the lack of a stock causes this rifle to fall under definition of a legal pistol in Coalition legal charter, making it much more common for sale than its larger brother.

Item.name: CQC Assault Rifle
Item.description: A powerful, relatively comapct bullpup assault rifle with an integrated 40mm underbarrel grenade launcher, designed for combat both in close quarters and at long range, owing to its deceptively long barrel but small overall profile combined with a blistering rate of fire.

Item.name: Wheelgun
Item.description: An old-school, six-shooter single-action revolver. Compared to more modern alternatives, it is slightly less powerful due to the poor fitting of the chamber and a little more difficult to use for a novice, but it can be fan-fired near as quickly as you can cock the hammer and hold the trigger.

Item.name: Levergun
Item.description: A classic lever-action rifle, chambering .38 revolver rounds. The long barrel gives them a decent bit of extra kick along with a greatly increased capacity for rounds, and lends toward improved accuracy and ease of handling in the larger frame, though it takes some skill to reload quickly. However, due to the increased bulk, it is difficult to carry around as casually as a sidearm.

Item.name: Vintage Rifle
Item.description: A positively ancient form of firearm likely dating back from Terra itself, this wood-stocked warhorse is still more than capable of performing up to par. It's lengthy power and solid assembly give it a little bit extra oomph, while it's well-worked action is designed for quicker firing when compared to more precise, modern alternatives.

Item.name: Makeshift Rifle
Item.description: A classic lever-action rifle, chambering .38 revolver rounds. The long barrel gives them a decent bit of extra kick along with a greatly increased capacity for rounds, and lends toward improved accuracy and ease of handling in the larger frame, though it takes some skill to reload quickly. However, due to the increased bulk, it is difficult to carry around as casually as a sidearm.

Item.name: Makeshift Shotgun
Item.description: A classic lever-action rifle, chambering .38 revolver rounds. The long barrel gives them a decent bit of extra kick along with a greatly increased capacity for rounds, and lends toward improved accuracy and ease of handling in the larger frame, though it takes some skill to reload quickly. However, due to the increased bulk, it is difficult to carry around as casually as a sidearm.

RangedWeapon.description: An old-school, six-shooter single-action revolver. Compared to more modern alternatives, it is slightly less powerful due to the poor fitting of the chamber and a little more difficult to use for a novice, but it can be fan-fired near as quickly as you can cock the hammer and hold the trigger.

Item.name: Micro Machinegun
Item.description: A blisteringly fast, but underpowered machine gun utilizing defense bot ammunition.

Item.name: Mobile Coiler
Item.description: A scaled-down coilgun, designed to be fired from the hip - most often with the aid of a powered exoskeleton to withstand it's recoil.

Item.name: Inferno Cannon
Item.description: A huge, heavy flamethrower, utilizing a highly ineffecient fuel injector system to lay down literal walls of fire.

Item.name: Rhino Weapon System
Item.description: A heavy-duty combination weapon, unifying a simplified HMG with a miniaturized flamethrower for a devastating shoulder-mounted close quarters weapon. Comparitively much easier to use than a LMG, but less effective as a raw bullet hose.

Item.name: Sub Carbine
Item.description: Originally designed prior to the re-legalization of automatic submachine guns on Europa under Coalition mandate on account of the overwhelming presence of hostile fauna, the sub carbine is a little more accurate and offers marginally more oomph per shot due to it's slightly longer barrel and more simplified layout, but it's limited to semi-automatic. It does have an exceptionally light trigger, however.

Item.name: Boarding Shotgun
Item.description: A rather common modification of the humble pump-action shotgun in Europa, owing to it's compact package lending toward ease-of-use in the confines of a submarine, making it the perfect weapon for convenient self defense against unwwanted visitors limited only by it's small capacity and loss of power due to it's shortened barrel.

Item.name: Vintage Shotgun
Item.description: A rather common modification of the humble pump-action shotgun in Europa, owing to it's compact package lending toward ease-of-use in the confines of a submarine, making it the perfect weapon for convenient self defense against unwwanted visitors limited only by it's small capacity and loss of power due to it's shortened barrel.

Item.name: Crossbow Bolt
Item.description: A precision-engineered broadhead crossbow bolt, light and deadly. It travels roughly as well through water as in air, and stacks more easily than harpoons, though it's pretty expensive.

Item.name: Compound Crossbow
Item.description: A modern compound bow made from strong, yet lightweight synthetic material. Performs well both in air and in water, though it's slow to load and fire.

Item.name: Magnum
Item.description: A monstrously large .61 caliber semi-automatic handgun. Compared to revolving alternatives, it is extremely unweidly in the hands of an amateur, but can lay out a disgusting amount of firepower considerably more quickly.
